headline: MGM Q1 Earnings Call: Digital Turnaround and International Expansion Take Center Stage
summary: Hospitality and casino entertainment company MGM Resorts (NYSE:MGM) met Wall Street’s revenue expectations in Q1 CY2025, but sales fell by 2.4% year on year to $4.28 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $0.69 per share was 51.5% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: DoubleDown Q1 Earnings & Revenues Miss Estimates, ARPDAU Up Y/Y
summary: DDI's first-quarter 2025 top line suffers due to dismal social casino/free-to-play games revenues.

headline: MGM Resorts appoints president of entertainment
summary: Ryan Abboushi will lead the company’s entertainment division, building “scalable, branded entertainment and content experiences” across destinations including Las Vegas.
